title: Workshop for Designing a Dynamic Learning Management System (DLMS) for Active Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Strengthens competency in designing active learning for scientific problem-solving in BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments.

learning_goals: Learners can design self-directed/collaborative learning activities using the DLMS interface.
Learners create scenarios adjusting group role changes and activity flow based on the LDO package.
Learners can measure learning engagement and collaboration efficiency using formative assessment tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
